Stay awake all night. Portly launched a new feature to keep your computer from sleeping when a port is active.

Stay awake all night.

We just launched a new feature this week that really helps for those of you who want to keep your website available for long periods of time, even when you're away from your computer.

It's a new setting in the app that prevents your computer from going to sleep when a port is active. Since it's a smart feature, it won't keep your computer from sleeping when you shut the lid of your laptop or force sleep mode.

All right, now that we've thoroughly tested it, it's 3am and I want to go to bed.

Posted September 04, 2013.
